scripts.clean: watchman watch-del-all && npm cache clean && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd ..
scripts.build: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/i && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ./app/build/outputs/apk/release/ && pwd && ls
